thread.title: HomeEscape Lists Top Reasons to Visit Florida this Summer
thread.title_full: HomeEscape Lists Top Reasons to Visit Florida this Summer

author: prbuzz.com
title: HomeEscape Lists Top Reasons to Visit Florida this Summer
text:
MIAMI, FL (9/18/2015) Miami based HomeEscape lists top reasons to plan a family vacation in Florida this year.
“I am excited to share some of the reasons why Florida is a great travel destination for families,” remarked Avi Vaknin, CEO of HomeEscape. “It is such a versatile travel destination – and, it is warm,” he said.
Florida is increasingly being recognized for its many attractions – not just as a retirement community for northeasterners. Although many travelers go to Orlando to explore the famous amusement parks, tourists are increasingly creating more DIY vacations.
“HomeEscape has a growing selection of vacation rental homes in Florida ,” Vaknin commented. “Vacation rental homes help reduce the expenses of a vacation significantly and permits families to get out and explore more. That is why we created our Florida destinations list – we hope families can get more out of their vacation.”
About HomeEscape: Headquartered in Miami, Florida, HomeEscape connects homeowners and property managers with travelers who seek the space, value and amenities of vacation rental homes as an alternative to hotels. With detailed property descriptions, photos and list of amenities and nearby attractions, HomeEscape makes it easy to find and compare properties all over the world.
Contact HomeEscape
